interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit- Easy Way To Get Perfect Eyebrows In Minutes,Waterproof, Middle Brown
Review Date: 2022/05/27
Store: ETEDES
Average Rating: 2.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ETEDES', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 3.62 x 1.02 inches; 1.45 Ounces'}
Review Text: This stencil kit is a complete joke. First of all, there are very few directions, and the first step is in Spanish while the rest are in English. Secondly, None of these stencils are normal size. Instead, they're about 1 1/4 the length of normal eyebrows. The powder is also much darker than it should be. I ended up looking like a clown when I used it, so I guess the fact that it's not waterproof as advertised is a good thing in this case because I was able to wash it off easily.
Review Title: Not waterproof at all
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Shiny Leaf Vitamin C Serum For Face, Hyaluronic Acid Serum And Retinol Serum Facial Skin Care Products Set, Anti Aging Skin Care Sets For Women And Men, 2 Fl. Oz x 3 - Big Bottles Of Skincare Serums
Shiny Leaf
{'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Anti-aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Shiny Leaf', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '4.9 x 1.6 x 5 inches; 14.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SL-TRIO'}
This serum set is a great product and has made my skin smooth, younger looking and overall, much healthier. I will note though, that if you're not used to using retinol, do your research and use it sparingly. It definitely can cause your skin to be dry and flaky at first. I only use it every 3 days or so with this regime and make sure to use moisturizer after I finish applying the serums. I use these serums at night and wash my face gently in the morning and I also use sunscreen if I go out after using retinol as it can cause sunburn. Overall, the benefits of retinol and all of these serums are extremely positive.
Great set
Eyebrow Stamp Stencil Kit- Easy Way To Get Perfect Eyebrows In Minutes,Waterproof, Middle Brown
ETEDES

Instead, they're about 1 1/4 the length of normal eyebrows. The powder is also much darker than it should be. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Focus:** Strong preference for serums emphasizing hydrating and anti-aging benefits.  
- **Product Features:** Values natural and health-conscious ingredients, with particular interest in vitamin C, hyaluronic acid, and retinol formulations.  
- **Usage Patterns:** Likely to adopt a cautious and well-researched approach to new products, especially those containing retinol. Prefers to integrate new serums gradually, using them every few days and complementing with moisturizers.  
- **Application Routine:** Tends to use skincare products primarily at night, with a consistent morning routine involving gentle cleansing and sun protection.  
- **Experience Awareness:** Acknowledges the potential effects of active ingredients on skin and seeks to educate themselves on best practices for product use.  
- **Review Behavior:** Shows a tendency to leave positive, insightful reviews based on product effectiveness and user experiences. However, recently expressed disappointment with a beauty product, criticizing its lack of usability and ineffective claims, leading to a notably low rating.  

Overall, this user exhibits a thoughtful and methodical approach to skincare, highlighting a commitment to achieving healthy skin through effective product use while remaining mindful of potential sensitivities. Despite focusing primarily on skincare, they also explore other beauty products but retain high expectations for effectiveness and usability.
